infos.info: One of the non-music segments of the program was the reading of the baseball scores. A high note was sounded by the orchestra following the score of the winning team, and a low, dismal note was played after the loser's score. If the victorious team scored an exceptional number of runs, the note was played with extra enthusiasm.
